AboutMe.aboutMeBody: I'm a self-taught web developer working to become a front-end engineer. I'm actively looking for opportunities that will allow me to practice and develop my coding and design skills. I love experimenting with new technologies and connecting with fellow developers. I'm particularly interested in working with local businesses and artists in Philadelphia. My skills includes JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Mocha, and React. I'm always seeking to grow and learn; contact me with any questions, or just to say hello!
